code_sintax_explanation:
There are several syntax errors in the code. 
1. Missing colon after the `if n == 0 or W == 0:` statement. 
2. Missing colon after the `if Wt[n - 1] > W:` statement. 
3. Missing colon after the `else` statement. 
4. Missing parentheses in the recursive call to `fun_1` in the last line of the function.
